infos.value: Y-you're...!?
Wh-wh-what're you doing here!?
Lady Mach√©rie...
Whatever has become of your knightly guardian?
She's gone off somewhere in search of Schuzelt.
I see...
Has something happened?
The truth of it is...
Most terrible...
But why would that knight go to such lengths to help Schuzelt?
Lilyth lost someone precious to her in the war with Fennes, too.
A lover?
No. A brother.
That makes sense. I suppose it is pain that bonds them.
Then there is naught else we can do.
J-just a moment... What are you planning?
With one knight gone, you'll need another to fill her place. I'll be your bodyguard. Just be grateful.
What? Not happy about it?
N-no, it's great. I mean, it's fine...
Then let's be off. Follow my lead!
